description: Fire was a constant danger in a crowded town or city, even during peace time. In a siege, archers would typically loose flaming arrows over the enemy walls in a bid to set the enemy's buildings on fire.
requirementsTooltip: Unlocked in Empire Phase. Requires Elite Archers Upgrade at the Barracks.
tooltip: Infantry archers +10 crush attack (for a strong anti-building attack), but attack rate +50% slower and cost +10 Wood.
